column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I wanted to go to San Francisco from my home in San Jose and I did n't feel like driving .
#id=2
#text=I looked online and found a bus route from here to there that was leaving in just about 30 minutes .
#id=3
#text=I walked out of my house to the bus stop and got on it .
#id=4
#text=It was a very empty bus and I stared out of the window at the scenery .
#id=5
#text=The bus driver was very nice and asked me how my day was .
#id=6
#text=We spoke for the whole entire ride and after a short time , we arrived into San Francisco .
#id=7
#text=It was very pleasant not having to drive and it was a very smooth ride on the bus .
#id=8
#text=Luckily , there was n't much traffic so we got there in a very short time frame .
#id=9
#text=After getting to the bus stop , the driver opened his doors for me and wished me a great day .
#text=I did the same and stepped off of the bus .
#text=it was a very easy and fun experience .
